mission: Pioneering secure, autonomous AI systems with a focus on defensive engineering.

core_pillars.title: Defensive AI Generation
core_pillars.description: Utilizing deterministic auditing layers to mitigate AI hallucinations and secure output integrity.

core_pillars.title: Agentic Orchestration
core_pillars.description: Orchestrating specialized LLMs (Qwen/Llama) via a central, manifest-driven control layer.

core_pillars.title: Privacy-First Deployment
core_pillars.description: Leveraging local inference (Ollama) to ensure data sovereignty and eliminate external API vulnerabilities.
